title: Credits and sources
content:
• A special thanks to @em and his fabulous website, especially useful for data info https://kinoko-wiki.com/
  • Big thanks to @GridZz who made me want to play crossbow since the beginning with his (french) guide: Crossbow guide and the discord channel: Discord discussion about it
  • Thanks to all my family @LesTempliers who really supported me during the development!
